April 14, 2018

If you’re interested in edtech and you aren’t reading Bradley Chambers’s weekly column in 9to5Mac, you’re missing out. Today’s post was a great one.

A little tip if you want to subscribe but don’t want the fire hose that is 9to5Mac in your RSS reader: subscribe to Bradley’s website, and he will link to his articles every week.
